annotation.spannedText: Please see Dr [**First Name (STitle) 424**] s note for details. Paracentesis yesterday, therapeutic 4L, and given albumin. Not c/w SBP. Cont Tachycardic, responded well to fluid boluses but worsened hyponatremia. 2.8L/1.6L out (including stool). Failing to respond quickly to lactulose, as he usually dose. New WBC. This is 6^th admission to MICU since [**12-19**] for refractory encephalopathy. Total time spent: 35 minutes Patient is critically ill.
